short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Specify how often your request will be sent?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that helps you specify a time in this plugin when you want to send your requests at regular intervals and this extension does the work for you. Therefore, your orders will be sent in order on a regular basis at the time of your choice. This extension optimized for the Online plus system (Which is Iranian stock market trading system).
